resources.string: Arwen The AI Assistant is Learning…
I need Accessibility Service to Observer Interactions when Switching Applications.\n& It Helps Me to Learn 24 / 7.
It Allows Me to Display Panel Over Other Applications in A Floating Window.\nPlease Grant the Permission by Enabling the Switch.
